amazonlogin



struct TokenInfo;


string aud;
this needs to be validated against our Client-Id

long exp;


string iss;


string user_id;


string app_id;


long iat;


struct UserProfile;


string name;


string email;


string user_id;


interface AmazonLoginApi;


abstract TokenInfo tokeninfo(string access_token);


abstract UserProfile profile();


alias AmazonLoginApiFactory = AmazonLoginApi function(string);


static AmazonLoginApi createAmazonLoginApi(string access_token);
